abstract: Shares, which had meandered for much of the day, began to turn higher as the session neared a close.
snippet: Shares, which had meandered for much of the day, began to turn higher as the session neared a close.
lead_paragraph: Investors snapped up industrial and materials stocks on Tuesday, helping the Dow soar to a 18-month high.

headline.main: Wall Street Gets a Little Momentum
headline.print_headline: Dow Soars to 18-Month High on Renewed Confidence About the Economy
